summary: After an all-night graduation beach party, a group of hung-over twenty-somethings awake to a beating sun, and a seemingly carnivorous beach that devours anything with a heartbeat that touches the sand.
cast: Brooke Butler|Cleo Berry|Cynthia Murell|Dean Geyer|Meagan Holder|Mitchel Musso|Hector David Jr.|Nikki Leigh|Bryan Billy Boone|Jamie Kennedy|Adam Powell|Etalvia Cashin|Jennifer Churchich|Michael Huntsman|Lauren Moyer|David Jason Perez
title: The Sand
